title: ccpkg Manifest Schema
description: Schema for the manifest.json file in a .ccpkg package.

name.description: Unique package identifier. Lowercase alphanumeric and hyphens only. No leading, trailing, or consecutive hyphens.

license.description: SPDX license identifier (e.g. MIT, Apache-2.0) or a file reference (e.g. SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE.md).

repository.description: URL of the source code repository.

homepage.description: URL of the package homepage or documentation site.

scope.description: Author's recommended install scope. 'user' for global user-level install, 'project' for project-local install, 'any' for no preference.

components.description: Declares the installable components included in the package. At least one component must be present (enforced by tooling, not expressible as a JSON Schema constraint).

skills.description: Paths to skill directories relative to the package root. Each directory MUST contain a SKILL.md file.

agents.description: Paths to agent directories relative to the package root. Each directory MUST contain an AGENT.md file.

commands.description: Paths to command files relative to the package root.

hooks.description: Path to a hooks.json file relative to the package root.

mcp.description: Path to a .mcp.json template file relative to the package root.

lsp.description: Path to a .lsp.json template file relative to the package root.

instructions.description: Path to a canonical instructions file relative to the package root.

config.description: Declares user-configurable values required by the package. Keys are configuration variable names.

type.description: The data type of this configuration value.

description.description: Human-readable explanation of what this configuration value controls.

required.description: Whether the user must provide a value during install. Defaults to false.

default.description: Default value used when the user does not provide one. Type varies based on the 'type' field.

values.description: Allowed values. Required when type is 'enum'.

compatibility.description: Declares version compatibility requirements. Keys are tool identifiers, values are semver range strings.

claude_code.description: Semver range for compatible Claude Code versions (e.g. >=1.0.0, ^2.1.0).

additionalProperties.description: Semver range for the named tool or runtime.

targets.description: Per-target overrides for component paths. Keys are target identifiers (e.g. tool names or platforms).

instructions_file.description: Override path to the instructions file for this target.

skills_dir.description: Override path to the skills directory for this target.

hooks_file.description: Override path to the hooks file for this target.

checksum.description: SHA-256 integrity hash of the archive contents. Format: sha256:<64-char hex digest>.
